Books    Maps & GIS    Digital Images    Using Special Collections & University Archives    Special Collections Research Guides       Eyebrow menu    Contact Us    My Accounts    Give to the Library    COVID-19    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map    UIC Today     Toggle Search                Breadcrumbs    Home    Help     Make an appointment with a librarian   Schedule a one-on-one research consultation with a librarian for assistance with your research, to learn advanced skills or to identify sources in a specific subject area.  Appointment requests must be made at least 24 hours in advance.        Request an appointment   Name     Email     College or department     Status     UIC Undergraduate     UIC Graduate     UIC Faculty     UIC Staff     UIC or JMLS alumni     Other       Date and time (first choice)  Monday-Friday, 8 a.m.-6 p.m. CST.     Date and time (second choice)  Monday-Friday, 8 a.m.-6 p.m. CST.     Date and time (third choice)  Monday-Friday, 8 a.m.-6 p.m. CST.     Where do you want to meet?     Chicago-Daley     Chicago-Daley: Special collections, university archives, maps, GIS     Chicago-Health Sciences     Chicago-John Marshall Law School     Peoria-Health Sciences     Rockford-Health Sciences     Urbana-Health Sciences     Online       If online, do you have a working headset or microphone for your computer?     Yes     No       What would you like to discuss in your appointment?      What might make this appointment most useful to you? For example, do you need any accommodations or assistance?
